name: Cloud Catcher Aviation
about: Cloud Catcher Aviation, located at the Great Falls International Airport in Great Falls, Montana, offers comprehensive airplane flight training under Part 61 regulations. Operating out of Holman Aviation, an FBO on the north end of the airport, the school provides aircraft rental and both primary and advanced flight instruction using the Piper Cherokee 140 and Piper Archer II. Students can pursue various certifications, including Private Pilot, Instrument Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Certified Flight Instructor (CFI and CFII). The training is tailored to prepare students for careers in aviation, with flexible payment options and a discounted rate for block hour purchases. To get started, prospective students can schedule a discovery flight to experience flight training firsthand. Contact Cloud Catcher Aviation today to embark on your aviation journey.
